about_the_game:
Welcome to a thrilling first person bio shooting game! Here, you will transform into a soldier and embark on dangerous missions on different battlefields. Each game consists of multiple rounds, and at the beginning of each round, you will be randomly assigned to either the human or infected faction.

Human camp: As a human soldier, you need to resist fierce attacks from infected individuals. Reasonably utilize soldier skills and supply boxes, wait for the best opportunity, become a hero on the battlefield, deal fatal blows to infected individuals, and achieve permanent killing!

Infected camp: As an infected person, your goal is to infect as many humans as possible. After being killed by a firing weapon, you will be resurrected and become even stronger. Take advantage of the resurrection opportunity to gradually defeat human heroes and expand your infection range!

After the game ends, you will receive gold coin rewards, which can be used to unlock new soldiers or infected individuals, purchase powerful weapons, and prepare adequately for the next game, striving for higher scores!

Join us and experience an unprecedented biochemical showdown. Who will be the ultimate winner?

content_descriptors.notes: The content contained in this game may not be suitable for all age groups or should not be accessed during work hours: frequent violent or bloody content, common adult content

name: Infection Warfare

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Processor G4560
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960M
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-12700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: This is a bio infectious shooting game. You will play as a human, resist the attack of infected individuals, wait for the opportunity to become a hero, and kill infected individuals to the point of no return. Or play the role of an infected person, infect humanity, and defeat all heroes.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
